## writing an simulation function
```{r}
sim_mean_sd = function(sample_size, true_mean = 10, true_sd = 5){
  sim_df = 
    tibble(
      x = rnorm(sample_size, true_mean, true_sd))
  
  out_df = sim_df |>
    summarize(
      mean = mean(x), 
      sd = sd(x))
  
  return(out_df)
}
```
